About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 8am-4:30pm; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans. Referral to paid researchers available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit (as early as possible) and proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Records relating to Aborigines, land rights, mining, environment. (85% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Northern Land Council: Records; Land claims, Ranger Uranium Environmental Inquiry 1975-1977.
